metadata.title: CVE-2016-9831 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the parseSWF_RGBA function in parser.c in thelistswf tool in libming 0.4.7 allows remote attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
